roleset.name: wages
roleset.note: EARN-V NOTES: Arg3 could also be used for"on holdings of $16 million"whenreporting dividend yield and such. (from earn.01-v)

example.name: it's a living
example.text: Composer Marc Marder earns his living *trace* playing the double bass in classical music ensembles.
example.arg: *trace* playing the double bass in classical music ensembles.

example.name: dividends
example.text: In fiscal 1988 the company earned $17.3 million on revenue of $352.9 million.

example.name: benefactive
example.text: ...a relationship with the government that *trace* has earned the Mitsubishi group the dubious moniker of"seisho".

example.name: with source
example.text: [Xerox Corp.'s third-quarter net income]-1 grew 6.2% on 7.3% higher revenue, *trace*-1 earning mixed reviews from Wall Street analysts.
